stepTitle: Suppose four point masses are placed on a number line as follows: $$m_1=30kg$$, placed at $$x_1=-2m$$, $$m_2=5kg$$, placed at $$x_2=3m$$, $$m_3=10kg$$, placed at $$x_3=6m$$, and $$m_4=15kg$$, placed at $$x_4=-3m$$. Find the moment of the system with respect to the origin and find the center of mass of the system.
